actions.name: Concussion Grenade
actions.detail: Throw a Concussion Grenade within Range 5. All characters within a Blast 2 area must pass a hull save or be pushed 2 spaces away from the center on failure or 1 space on a success.

actions.name: Concussion Mine
actions.detail: Deploy a Concussion mine. All characters within the affected area are knocked back 2 spaces and must pass a hull save or be knocked prone.

name: Micro-Maintenance Suite
effect: Two allied mech characters in line of sight and sensors gain 3 overshield.
description: The GMS Micro-Maintenance Suite activates spare motile ablative and fabrication modules commonly found in combat vehicles to proactive protect key components.

name: Systems Override
description: GMS wartime electronic assault packages typically focus on exploiting commonalities among mech systems.

actions.name: Systems Override
actions.detail: Make a tech attack against an hostile character in line of sight and sensors. On a success, the target takes 4 heat and is impaired and immobilized until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Shock Grenade
actions.detail: All characters within the affected area must pass an engineering save. On a failure, they take 2 heat and are impaired until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take 1 heat and they are not impaired.

actions.name: Shock Mine
actions.detail: All characters within the affected area must pass an engineering save. On a failure, they take 4 heat and are jammed until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take 2 heat and they are not jammed.

name: The Seventh Lesson
effect: Gain the following quick tech actions. A character can only be affected by an option 1/scene.
description: Primera always taught us to learn from others; show the Jailers what we have learned.

actions.name: Imprison
actions.detail: Make a tech attack against a hostile character. On a success, the target takes 4 heat and is Immobilized until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Persecute
actions.detail: A hostile character in Sensors must pass a Systems save. On a failure, attacks against them gain +1 accuracy and ignore all difficulty and Invisible. This effect lasts until an attack misses them, or they pass a Systems save as a full action. Otherwise, it lasts until they are destroyed, or the end of the scene.

deployables.name: Final Lesson
deployables.detail:
hile this system is installed, you do not Eject normally. Instead, the Final Lesson motorbike is detached and flies 6 spaces directly from the chassis, causing your mech to Shut Down. The Final Lesson carries all pilots and copilots with it when it detaches, but not any non-pilot passengers. While riding this vehicle, if you are adjacent to your mech, you may re-attach to your mech as a quick action, causing your mech to Boot Up. This is the only way you can Mount your mech while riding the Final Lesson.

While riding, you have hard cover, and you can jump horizontally up to your speed and vertically up 1 space. Gain the following actions:

actions.name: Powerslide
actions.detail: Move up to your speed in a straight line, ignoring engagement and passing through hostile characters. Characters Size 1 or smaller must pass an Agility save or take 1 kinetic damage and be knocked Prone. The Final Lesson is knocked Prone at the end of this movement if at least 1 Size 1 character failed this save.

actions.name: Micro Rocket
actions.detail:
Limited 2
Make a ranged attack against a target in range 10 against E-Defense. On hit, they take 5 explosive damage, or 10 AP explosive damage if they are at or below half health. This ability benefits from any bonuses to Limited charges.

actions.name: Drift
actions.detail: 1/turn, move 3 spaces in any direction, ignoring reactions and engagement.

actions.name: Activate Seventh Lesson
actions.detail: If you have The Seventh Lesson installed in your mech, you may use that system, treating your Sensors as 5.
